Script.name: GaussianKernel
Script.text:
#PARNAME=sigma #LOC=1,1 #HASWEIGHT
def connectionFunc(srclocs,dstlocs,sigma):
import math
# Corrected normterm (2015/01/16): normterm = 1/(math.pow(sigma,2)*2*math.pi)
i = 0 out = [] for srcloc in srclocs: j = 0 for dstloc in dstlocs: dist = math.sqrt(math.pow((srcloc[0] - dstloc[0]),2) + math.pow((srcloc[1] - dstloc[1]),2) + math.pow((srcloc[2] - dstloc[2]),2))
gauss = normterm*math.exp(-0.5*math.pow(dist/sigma,2))
if gauss > 0.001: #sys.stdout.write('gauss>0.0001: i={0} gauss={1}'.format( i, gauss)) conn = (i,j,0,gauss) out.append(conn)
j = j + 1 i = i + 1 #sys.stdout.write('out length: %d' % len(out)) return out

def connectionFunc(srclocs,dstlocs,sigma):
import math
# Corrected normterm (2015/01/16): normterm = 1/(math.pow(sigma,2)*2*math.pi)
i = 0 out = [] for srcloc in srclocs: j = 0 for dstloc in dstlocs: dist = math.sqrt(math.pow((srcloc[0] - dstloc[0]),2) + math.pow((srcloc[1] - dstloc[1]),2) + math.pow((srcloc[2] - dstloc[2]),2))
gauss = normterm*math.exp(-0.5*math.pow(dist/sigma,2))
if gauss > 0.001: #sys.stdout.write('gauss>0.0001: i={0} gauss={1}'.format( i, gauss)) conn = (i,j,0,gauss) out.append(conn)

Script.name: TectotectalInhibition
Script.text:
#PARNAME=sigma #LOC=1,1 #HASWEIGHT
def connectionFunc(srclocs,dstlocs,sigma):
import math normterm = 1/(math.pow(sigma,2)*2*math.pi)
i = 0 out = [] for srcloc in srclocs: j = 0 for dstloc in dstlocs:
s1 = srcloc[1] # Invert one dimension of the sources prior to dist calculation: s0 = -1*(srcloc[0]-(49.0/2.0)) s2 = srcloc[2] d1 = dstloc[1] d0 = dstloc[0]-(49.0/2.0) d2 = dstloc[2]
dist = math.sqrt(math.pow((s0 - d0),2) + math.pow((s1 - d1),2) + math.pow((s2 - d2),2))
conn_weight = normterm*math.exp(-0.5*math.pow(dist/sigma,2))
if conn_weight > 0.001: conn = (i,j,0,conn_weight) out.append(conn)
j = j + 1
i = i + 1
return out
